meanings.definition: A day of final judgment or destruction.
meanings.sent1: Many people fear the doomsdays when everything will be destroyed.
meanings.sent2: The doomsdays in the movie were depicted with great special effects.
meanings.sent3: During the doomsdays, even the bravest heroes trembled in fear.
meanings.sent4: The doomsdays felt like a looming shadow over the town.
meanings.sent5: The doomsdays were described in ancient prophecies as a time of reckoning.

meanings.definition: A time of catastrophic events or great suffering.
meanings.sent1: The doomsdays brought about widespread devastation and despair.
meanings.sent2: In times of doomsdays, people come together to support each other.
meanings.sent3: Despite the doomsdays, there was a glimmer of hope shining through.
meanings.sent4: The doomsdays felt like a never-ending storm of chaos and turmoil.
meanings.sent5: Surviving the doomsdays required immense strength and resilience.

meanings.definition: The last day of the world's existence.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of the doomsdays as the ultimate end of all things.
meanings.sent2: Scientists debate whether doomsdays are a real possibility for Earth.
meanings.sent3: The doomsdays party was a strange mix of celebration and melancholy.
meanings.sent4: The doomsdays loomed like a dark cloud on the horizon of time.
meanings.sent5: Preparing for the doomsdays became a global concern among nations.
